patterns: Give me information about VNRVJIET
responses: Vallurupalli Nageswara Rao Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering and Technology (VNRVJIET) is an engineering college in Hyderabad, India recognized by All India Council for Technical Education(AICTE) and affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad.

patterns: What are different clubs in college?
responses: There are 9 clubs 1)STENTORIAN - ENGLISH LITERATURE CLUB 2) VIGNANA JYOTHI SAHITIVANAM - TELUGU LITERATURE CLUB ;3)VJ THEATRO ; 4) DRAMATRIX;5)SCINTILLATE -PHOTOGRAPHY;6)CREATIVE ARTS - ARTS CLUB; 7)LIWE WIRE- DANCE CLUB ; 8) NSS - SOCIAL SERVICE CLUB ; 9)CRESCENDO- MUSIC CLUB
There are total 9 extra circular activities clubs in VNRVJIET and many more co circular clubs.

patterns: What are the literature clubs in college?
responses:
There are two literary clubs in VNRVJIET
 1.Stentorian-English Literature club 
 2.Sahitivanam-Telugu Literature club

patterns: What is Stentorian ?
responses: Sentorian is the English literature club of vnrvjiet. It is the place where students meet to read and write.The literary club has been an ongoing and active club for several years.It is based upon using the creativity skills it takes to be a writer.

patterns: What is Sahitivanam in VNRVJIET?
responses:
It is Sahitivanam-Telugu literature club of vnrvjiet,place where students meet to read and write.
 	 	The literary club has been an ongoing and active club for several years.
It is based upon using the creativity skills it takes to be a writer.

patterns: what is the arts club in VNRVJIET?
responses: Creative Arts- arts club of vnrvjiet.Creative Arts organized different events and activities to bring up ones talent in arts and at the same time it has built the different models at the time of annual fests of vnrvjiet.

patterns: what is the dance club in vnrvjiet?
responses:
LiveWire- dance club of vnrvjiet.Livewire is an all-style collegiate dance crew from vnrvjeit.
The club has participated in different competitions across India and won several rewards and recognition.

patterns: what is the music club in vnrvjiet?
responses:
Cresendo-music club of vnrvjiet.Cresendo consists of highly talented keyboard players,guitarists',vocal's,flutists and others.
The club has participated in different competitions across India and won several rewards and recognition.

patterns: what is the photography club in vnrvjiet?
responses: Scinitallate-the offical photography club of vnrvjiet.Club has highly talented people in clicking pictures with perfect detailing and picture quality.Scintillate organized different events like selfie booth and b/w picture at time of annual fests.

patterns: what is the social service club in vnrvjiet?
responses:
is the social club of vnrvjiet.
Nss organised different events like be a teacher,blood donation camp,harithavanam,vertical garden,ganesh idol making,fist full of rice etc.
The club helped many needy people with different activities.

patterns: what is the short film club in vnrvjiet?
responses:
It is the short film club of vnrvjiet.Vjteatro is the biggest short film college club in Telangana.
It has released different short films like dochay,how I met myself,dope,priya,ek villain etc

patterns: what is the drama club in vnrvjiet?
responses: It is the offical drama club of vnrvjiet.It is the club where actions meets passion and club has done different live performances.

patterns: What are the different departments in VNRVJIET?
responses: There are 9 Departments in VNRVJIET 1)IT 2)CIVIL 3)EEE 4)MECHANICAL 5)ECE 6)CSE 7)EIE 8)AE 9)HUMANITY AND SCIENCES

patterns: what is the admission process at vnrvjiet?
responses: A Student at vnr can be admitted in 3 ways 1)A-cat(eamcet,spot admissions) 2)B-cat(jee main) 3)Nri(12th marks).Last year cutoff ranks are provided for reference http://www.vnrvjiet.ac.in/download/admissions/FIRST_LAST_EAMCET_2019_RANKS.pdf
